name: Social Distancing (xlia)
description:
Note - This game is a rough sketch, not finished and  therefore there are so many glitches. (please don't attack me for the glitches, you've been warned. I know the glitches exist)

This game was inspired by the covid-19 pandemic situation where you have to social distance yourself from other people to survive.  You're a little blob walking on the street and you need to avoid other blobs and collect masks. After a certain amount of time, your mask will runs out and the game will be over.

I made this game from scratch for the Ludum Dare #46 event. This is my first contribution to LD and I missed the start day so I only get to work on this in less than 48 hours instead of 72.
